name: Sternentaenzer Das Geheimnisvolle Pferd
overview: It's summer holidays and Caro can be star dancer with her magical horse all the time. But then it is broken into the horse farm Lindenhain, two horses from the area disappear without a trace and finally star dancers is kidnapped! Caro must pass dangerous adventures and solve tricky puzzles to rescue her darling and uncover the mystery of the disappearance of horses. Of course, she must not neglect the farm - because at the moment the competition is going to the "Best Horse Farm". Exciting story with tricky puzzles Extensive horse care Mystic elements Lovingly drawn environments Simple, intuitive control
